commit.message:
tree-ssa-loop-ivopts.c (split_address_cost): Check depends_on.


	* tree-ssa-loop-ivopts.c (split_address_cost): Check depends_on.
	(get_computation_cost_at): Ditto.
	(determine_use_iv_cost_address): Pass NULL for arguments depends_on
	and inv_expr_id.

From-SVN: r229514

+	and inv_expr_id.
